modemAlarmUpdated.title: Modem alarm example (example-identifier) was updated.
modemAlarmUpdated.description:
Modem alarm example (example-identifier) was updated:

- Description was changed from 'example' to 'updated-example'.

- Trigger condition was updated.

- Default health level was changed from 'Error' to 'Warning'.

- Health level (after resolved) was changed from 'Warning' to 'INSPECT'.

- Period for health level after resolved was changed from 'PT1H' to 'PT48H'.
